name: Character Customizer
description:
Game Description 

A small piece that has been made as part of a side project I am working on. Allows you to build your very own custom avatar that will be used in the final product. 

Very easy to add more assets to, to create even more possibilities for the user to select from. Thought it could be quite flexible to integrate into different games so I kept it separate from the rest of my actual game. However their is some work that still needs to be done for it to be labelled as complete.
